reviewText: Music is nice, and fairly decent work-out.  Cues are a little difficult to follow, but after doing it a few times, it gets easier.  The twist on the grapevine move is a bit awkward (stepping in front instead of behind), but again, you get used to it after a few times.
This video is perfect for beginners and people with arthritis. I especially like the fact that it had "Praise" music in the background.

This is a good workout if you can do cardio.  I bought it with hopes I could do it with my physical limits but it is to fast and the movements are to much if you have any limitations.  If you don't good work out I DID WATCH IT AND TRIED SOME OF IT.
